channel.title: Shakespeare on Joshua Feldman
channel.description: Recent content in Shakespeare on Joshua Feldman

item.title: Introducing Sonnet Explorer
item.description:
For the past few months I’ve been sneaking in evenings building Sonnet Explorer – an interactive guide to all 154 of Shakespeare’s sonnets. It started as a way to keep track of the rabbit holes I fall into whenever I reread the sequence, and it’s now a proper site that lets you move fluidly between poems, commentary and vocabulary.

I wanted the homepage to feel less like a static table of contents and more like a living map of the sequence. Right now you can:
